Crawl date: 2016/09/29 03:37:53
Debate Argument: Cats are better than dogs | Debate.org
Number of arguments: 4


Evidence Pro: Cats are cuter and sweeter. They are also softer and quieter.

Evidence Pro: Adri_Angel forfeited this round. Con In certain scenarios, a dog would be more reliable than most cats. Take a robbery as one, if you were getting robbed and you were at home, I doubt a cat would help you. Most likely run off unlike a dog. In that scenario, the dog would most likely attack the robber or warn you. For this reason, that's why you see more dogs than cats assisting the army, fire fighters, etc. They are more reliable, dedicated, and loving. This is why dogs are better than cats. On a reliability level, and caring level.

Evidence Pro: Adri_Angel forfeited this round. Con Well since my contender has failed to back her opinion up, twice and forfeited, I believe I do win. Dogs are better than cats because they are more loyal and loving. Cats fail to offer any sort of love and care and are more agressive. They don't give two f*cks. about people and when they do, it is very rare. But for dogs, they take the time to play with you and enjoy your company. And if you want cute, there are so many cute breeds of dogs. Also, if you haven't see those videos with the dogs going to the funerals of the fallen soilders, you need to watch them.

Evidence Con: I will be taking the CON side, also known as the dog side. Dogs are a mans best friend. They are loyal and compatible. Unlike cats, they sare empathy with their owner. Dogs can be cuter, softer, and more reliable. Cats are more independant. Whereas dogs are more obident and loyal. Not to mention, the majority of cats are hella creepy with their marble eyes. I'll get into detail in the next rounds.

Evidence Con: In certain scenarios, a dog would be more reliable than most cats. Take a robbery as one, if you were getting robbed and you were at home, I doubt a cat would help you. Most likely run off unlike a dog. In that scenario, the dog would most likely attack the robber or warn you. For this reason, that's why you see more dogs than cats assisting the army, fire fighters, etc. They are more reliable, dedicated, and loving. This is why dogs are better than cats. On a reliability level, and caring level.

Evidence Con: Well since my contender has failed to back her opinion up, twice and forfeited, I believe I do win. Dogs are better than cats because they are more loyal and loving. Cats fail to offer any sort of love and care and are more agressive. They don't give two f*cks. about people and when they do, it is very rare. But for dogs, they take the time to play with you and enjoy your company. And if you want cute, there are so many cute breeds of dogs. Also, if you haven't see those videos with the dogs going to the funerals of the fallen soilders, you need to watch them.
